name: Horse Jumping Tournament 2018
description:
Are you interested to play horse jumping 2018?? So, what are you waiting for? Hurry up and download horse jumping tournament 2018!!




Game Tips:

- Get cash reward by completing every level before allocated time
- Use cash to buy multiple horse simulator
- Don’t hit the hurdles and horse racing tracks while crossing



How To Play:

- Tap easy button to increase the racing horse speed
- Tap jump button to cross over the hurdles



Key Features:

- Stunning 3D environment
- Realistic horse simulator physics
- Real Animations
- Great horse jumping sound effects
- Plenty of horse selections
- Various horse jocky
